title: Store taking forever, just take my money already!
body: Tried to buy $20 of rp twice and waited 15 minutes, not willing to wait the whole half hour, I'm going to play and try again but I don't want $60 charged to my account. Of all the things that should not be bugged/work all the time is the store. Come on riot, you know that you are one of the biggest games, upgrade your servers or client already. Thought tencent would wanna upgrade it but guess not... Guess all the support is heading to china :/

replies.body: Thanks for the details friends!  We're looking into this purchasing issue, and will have things back in order asap!

>
> Thanks for the details friends!  We're looking into this purchasing issue, and will have things back in order asap!

What shall i do? XD I don't want to leave everything on and open till it's fixed lol

It wouldn't be fair to keep waiting on the processing screen, and it's possible that the purchase could fail until the issue's resolved.  If you're currently experiencing this, play some games and enjoy yourself until it gets fixed up.  Hang in there!

Alright, Riot heard us and fixed their stuff! I got my RP and bought the stuff I wanted


Everything is fixed, and for that I gotta say thanks to Rito for listening to us <3


Glad to know riot cares about its customer <3

See Y'all in hell {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Was going to say, mine just now cleared up as well.
Same problem as well. Purchased $20 RP and all it ever did was process. It did not complete the transaction and have not received the RP as of yet.
After restarting the client I waited a while to see if the RP would show. It did not so when I tried again to purchase the RP it went through no problem.

I bought the $20 RP, loading screen for it went through, but I have yet to see a confirmation email, and no RP on account. I already tried relogging didn't clear anything up. Played a game (bout 40 minutes) still no sign of RP purchase, or email. Any word on whats going on Riot? I'm fine waiting, but uggh.. I wanna buy the skins already.

~edit 
Waited a good hour + But, everything went through, got points, only thing is RP on cash shop is taking awhile to display correct current amount. But other than that, it's good!

Just a quick question friends, I bought a prepaid card worth 25$ at a couche-tard at 18:46:31 PM, code was unscratched, scratched it when I came home and entered it under the store tab (normal stuff, been doing this for 3 years now) 

Everything was fine(~~until the bug nation attacked~~)

Not only did the 25$ worth of rp didnt go in, but it seems that the code got redeemed as well. considering the store is having issues right now, I would assume its normal and everything is gonna be fine right? I just want other people's opinion, and perhaps rioters opinion too...


Also, I can't redeem anymore code since I tried too much to redeem it. I have the worst luck ever (~~my fault doe~~)

Are you still experiencing this issue?  After I select RP, there is a slight delay for me but it eventually opens up.  Any additional information on any errors or where it's happening can help.  Let me know!

Oi I can't purchase RP at all with visa, is there a problem going on with cards getting declined?

I have checked and know for a fact I have sufficient funds and access.
